==O'Browser==

O'Browser is an OCaml virtual machine written in Javascript, to run OCaml program in browsers!
It is independant from Eliom and Ocsigen's server. You can use it with any Web server.

[[install|Download from here]].

O'Browser's tutorial is [[http://www.pps.jussieu.fr/~canou/obrowser/tutorial/|here]] for now.

See also the O'Browser-specific OCaml modules [[sources/rt/caml/js.ml|Js]] and [[sources/rt/caml/jSOO.ml|JSOO]] and <<a_manual chapter="bindings"|how to write bindings>>.
